Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides derived from flatfish genes.
Literature.Author: Patrzykat A, Gallant JW, Seo JK, Pytyck J, Douglas SE

Literature.Title: The zebrafish embryo as a tool for screening and characterizing pleurocidin host-defense peptides as anti-cancer agents.
Literature.Author: Morash MG, Douglas SE, Robotham A, Ridley CM, Gallant JW, Soanes KH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml,Zebrafish embryos:>10% Killing=1 µM,Zebrafish embryos:>10% Killing=5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas salmonicida 99-1(MIC=8µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida 97-4(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar typhimurium MS7953s(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli CGSC 4908(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus C623(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida albicans C627(MIC=16µg/ml),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(50% Cell death=64µg/ml)
